overview:
Chad Robley CEO at Mindgruve, a digital media company Cofounder, My Medical Forum

A seasoned entrepreneur with large scale consumer and technology-based business experience. Mr. Robley is the Founder and CEO of Mindgruve, a digital marketing agency with offices in San Diego and Irvine, California. Mr. Robley also cofounded, My Medical Forum, a physician-only social network specifically designed for smart phones and digital tablets.

Additionally, Mr. Robley is the Managing Director for Mindgruve Ventures with portfolio investments in HoneymoonWishes.com, Sunfood.com, PixelMags.com and MyMedicalForum.com. He is the co-chair for Interactive Day, one of Southern California’s largest interactive media events, as well as a Board of Director for San Diegoâ€™s American Advertising Federation.

Specialties:

  • Business Modeling
  • Marketing Strategy
  • E Commerce
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Search Marketing
  • Social Media
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Mobile Technology

Mr. Robley is also a passionate contributor to various philanthropic organizations serving children and the arts within the community of San Diego.

milestones.description: A safe, secure physician-only network specifically designed for smart phones and tablets.
